profile.title: Yusa Profail
profile.mustLogin: Yu mas log in pastaim bilong lukim ol seting.
profile.disappearingMessages: Onim ol mesij i save lus
profile.saveError: Eror: No inap seivim ol seting
profile.noPrivateKey: I nogat praivet ki long dispela divais bilong eksport.
profile.importSuccess: Praivet ki i go insait long dispela divais.
profile.importFailed: Import i pail (rong paswod o fail i bagarap).
profile.keysRotated: Nupela ki-pia i wokim na pablik ki i go antap.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Praivet ki bilong yu i no lusim dispela divais. Seivim kopi i gat paswod bilong mekim restor long narapela divais.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Nau yu stap long Fri—yusim kwik Sun/Moon daunbilo. Sapos yu laik planti tim, apgreitim.
profile.backupDesc: Wokim ol bakap i gat paswod bilong ol ki, na mekim restor long narapela divais bilong sinku.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Blur taim app i no stap long fes
profile.notifyOnCopy: Tokim mi sapos man i kopiim mesij bilong mi
profile.followHint: Stori bilong ol bai kamap long Foloing feed sapos ol i postim long ol Foloa (o Pablik).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Sampela samting i go rong insait long dispela seksen.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Senkim kol na teks i kam long fon o imel yu bin verifaim. Kol/teks yu salim inap soim Chatforia namba bilong yu.
profile.forwardTextsToPhone: Foawadim teks i go long fon
profile.forwardTextsToEmail: Foawadim teks i go long imel

chat.selectPrompt: Makim teks o chatrum na statim toktok
chat.emptySubtitle: Salim wanpela mesij na statim chat.

status.captionLabel: Wanem samting i stap long tingting bilong yu?
status.filesNote: Antap 5 fail. I stap 24 awa tasol.

premium.heading: Go Premium
premium.description: Opim paoa-fecha na rausim ol ad.

auth.headline: Sef, global mesinjing wantaim kwik translesen
auth.description: En-tu-en enkripson, AI translesen, ol mesij i save lus, na kol/vidio.

feature.disappearing: Ol mesij i save lus & rid risit
feature.privacy: Praivasi pastaim. Data bilong yu em kontrol bilong yu.

auth.desktopTip: Yu stap long desktop? Scanim wantaim fon bilong kisim app.

headlineAlt.highlight: i save toktok olsem yu yet

auth.subhead: Praivet, enkrip, na translet mesij — kwik tru.
auth.tip: Yu ken yusim Chatforia long enidivais — o daunlodim app bilong gutpela eksperiens.
auth.scanHint: Scan na daunlod app o opim long brausa.

footer.doNotSell: No ken salim infomesen bilong mi

home.title: Hom
home.subheader: Salim wanpela mesij na statim chat.

press.title: Pres
press.contact: Sapos yu gat askim bilong media, raitim long press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Sapos media i askim, raitim long press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia em i sef mesinja wantaim kwik translesen na E2E enkripson, bilong mekim toktok namel long pipol i stap praivet na isi.
press.assetsText: Logo, skrinshot, na piksa bilong prodak (bai kamap kwiktaim).

careers.title: Wok
careers.intro: Mipela liklik tim i wok long wanpela global, praivet mesinja. Sapos yu laik long enkripson, aksesiboliti, na nais UX, mipela laik harim long yu.
careers.openRoles: Ol wok i op: Injinia (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Prodak, Supot.
careers.apply: Olsem wanem long apelae: Imelim CV/linc long jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Abaot Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia em i sef, multilanguis mesinja wantaim en-tu-en enkripson, kwik translesen, na kol/vidio. Mission bilong mipela em isi: helpim pipol long konek — sef, praivet, na antap long ol tokples.

values.control: Kontrol: Ol mesij i save lus na rid risit i opsen.

about.howDescription: Mesij i enkrip long divais bilong yu pastaim na em i go aut. Translesen, bakap, na sinku mipela i planim bilong daunim save mipela inap lukim.

advertise.title: Advertais wantaim Chatforia
advertise.description: Kasem ol yusa i save yusim mesinja wantaim nais, sef plesmen. Mipela gat bana ples, sponso sip na haus promo. Ol Premium yusa ol i no lukim ad.

adsense.withPubId: Nau mipela i yusim Google AdSense. Sapos yu laik targetim mipela long Google Ads, yusim pablista ID {{pubId}} na askim bilong manes plesmen long ol unit daunbilo. Direct sponsosip tu i stap—yusim fom.
adsense.noPubId: Nau mipela i yusim Google AdSense. Direct sponsosip tu i stap—yusim fom daunbilo.

advertise.noPlacements: I no gat plesmen yet. Putim ol insait long ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Taim i planti na ofen yus long chat UI
why.sponsoredMoments: Sponso moment (olsem “Statim Chat” modal) i stap
why.deals: Direk dil o programatik long AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Tenkyu! Toksave bilong yu i go pinis. Mipela bai bekim kwiktaim.
form.missingRequired: Plis pulim nem, imel, na mesej.
form.successToast: Tenkyu! Mipela bai toktok wantaim yu.
form.mailtoInfo: Mipela i opim imel klien bilong salim tok…
form.messagePlaceholder: Tageting, de, KPI, plesmen yu laik…

legal.disclaimerStart: Taim yu submitem, yu orai long

upgrade.title: Apgreitim
upgrade.subtitle: Painim stret plen bilong yu: rausim ad wantaim Plus, o kisim ful paoa-fecha wantaim Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Sabsikripsen bai pinis
scheduleBanner.body: Yu bai go bek long Fri long

free.title: Fri
free.ctaUnavailable: Senisim i go Fri (i no stap)

gettingStarted.title: Stat Nau
gettingStarted.subtitle: Nupela long Chatforia? Dispela kwik stat bai soim yu ol esensel na bai yu redi kwik.

alert.text: Dispela gaid bai gro taim mipela i lanisim nupela fecha. Sapos sampela samting i lus, tokim mipela long

section2.title: 2) Statim mesinjing
section2.item1: Wokim DM o Grup na salim namba wan mesij.
section2.item2: Yusim kwik translesen bilong toktok long 100+ tokples.
section2.item3: Trarim ol mesij i save lus na rid risit long Profail → Praivasi.

section3.title: 3) Go isi go antap
section3.item1Part2: peij (Plus = no ad, Premium = ful fecha).
section3.item2Part1: Linkim moa divais na setim enkripim bakap long

account.q: Olsem wanem bai mi wokim o kisim bek akaun?
account.a: Daunlodim app o yusim web, tap “Wokim akaun”, na verifaim imel/o fon. Bilong kisim bek, yusim “Foget paswod”.

privacy.a: Yes. Ol mesij na kol i en-tu-en enkrip. Yu na husat yu toktok wantaim tasol inap ritim.

translate.q: Olsem wanem kwik translesen i wok?
translate.a: Onim “Auto-translate” long Seting → Apirens & Tokples. Mipela i translet long divais sapos inap, na sapos nogat mipela yusim seif API wantaim liklik metadata tasol.

contact.a: Raitim long support@chatforia.com. Inkludim skrinshot na vesin bilong app.

contact.title: Kontakim Mipela
contact.successMsg: Tenkyu — tim bilong mipela bai bekim long imel.
contact.errorSend: No inap salim. Plis raitim long support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Dispela Praivasi Polisi i explenim olsem wanem Chatforia (“mipela”) i kisim, yusim, na serim infomesen taim yu yusim ol app na sevis bilong mipela. Mipela planim Chatforia bilong daunim data mipela inap lukim.

infoWeCollect.title: Infomesen mipela i kisim
infoWeCollect.account: Akaun infomesen (olsem imel/fon) bilong wokim na seifim akaun.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Enkripim konten (ol mesij/kol) em E2E; mipela i no inap ritim.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Daignostik/iusis olsem krash log, kain divais, o liklik analitik bilong improvim pefomens.

howWeUse.title: Olsem wanem mipela i yusim infomesen
howWeUse.provide: Ranim sevis na seifim (ot, spem/abus deteksen).
howWeUse.improve: Improvim ol fecha (kwoliti bilong translesen, riliabiliti).

sharing.title: Searing
sharing.body: Mipela i no salim pesonal data. Sampela taim mipela ken serim liklik data wantaim ol prosesaman (olsem pus notifikesen, analitik) aninit long strong kontrak.

rights.title: Raits bilong yu
rights.body: Bai long ples bilong yu (olsem GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), yu ken askim long kisim, stretim, delitim, o no laik sampela kain prusesing. Kontak: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Holim data & sikiriti
retention.body: Mipela holim tasol samting i nidim long ranim sevis na yusim indastri-stanap sikiriti. E2E konten mipela i no inap lusim enkrip.

children.title: Pikinini
children.body: Chatforia i no bilong ol pikinini aninit long 13 yia (o olsem lo bilong ples bilong yu i tok).

changes.title: Senas
changes.body: Mipela bai putim apdet long hia na senisim “Las apdet” de.

intro.body: Taim yu yusim Chatforia yu orai long ol dispela Tems. Sapos yu no orai, no ken yusim sevis.

accounts.title: Akaun
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Soim tru infomesen na holim ol kredensol i seif.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Yu yet i risponsibol long ol samting i mekim insait long akaun bilong yu.

acceptableUse.title: Gudpela yus
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: No ken yusim long rong/iligo, abus, o rabis konten; no spem o otomatik abus.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Sapos yu brukim, mipela ken suspen/terminet.

yourContent.title: Konten bilong yu
yourContent.body: Yu yet i holim raits long konten bilong yu. Yu givim mipela raits i nidim bilong ranim sevis (olsem rautim, stoa, translesen).

disclaimer.title: Disklama & laibiliti
disclaimer.body: Sevis i kam “olsem i stap” wantaim no gat worranti. Long bigpela hap bilong lo, Chatforia i no gat laibiliti long ol hevi i kamap nating o bihainim.

changes.title: Senas
changes.body: Mipela inap apdetim ol dispela tems; sapos yu yusim yet bihain long senis, em i minim yu orai.

doNotSell.title: No Ken Salim o Serif Infomesen Bilong Mi
doNotSell.body: Chatforia i no salim pesonal infomesen. Tasol ol pipol bilong Kalifonia inap submitem rekues aninit long CPRA long button daunbilo.

cookies.title: Kuki Seting
cookies.body: Chatforia i yusim liklik kuki (olsem sesen, sikiriti). Mipela i no yusim kuki bilong ad pati namba 3. Manesim kuki long brausa seting bilong yu.
